item.title: Empty GKE
item.description: GKE Sandbox # Deploy with CloudShell Description # Just Google Kubernetes Engine cluster List of the components used in this sandbox: GKE Cluster Setup # NOTE: If you want to undeploy or update an existing stack please proceed directly to Step 3 - Recover First you need initialize the sandbox configuration. To do this please run the initialization command: hub stack init The command will prompt you to enter the GCP project ID and will create initial configuration files and download required components.

item.title: Web Server + PHP + Cloud SQL
item.description: Web Server Sandbox Stack # Deploy with CloudShell Description # Web Server Sandbox stack with VM, private VPC, load balancer, private Cloud SQL List of the components used in this stack: SSL Certificate VPC Network Cloud SQL Cloud NAT Managed Instance Group Load balancing DNS Zone Record Load generator Setup # NOTE: If you want to undeploy or update an existing stack please proceed directly to Step 3 - Recover

item.title: With Demo App
item.description: Cloud Composer # Deploy with CloudShell Description # This sandbox will deploy a Cloud Composer List of the components used in this sandbox: Network Cloud Composer Environment Dataflow Pipeline Example Cloud Storage Bucket BigQuery Table Note: additional details are available in Cloud Composer Guide Setup # NOTE: If you want to undeploy or update an existing stack please proceed directly to Step 3 - Recover
